introduction: Ok Chol, Pom Sun’s husband, works at a power plant building site. He has never had time for his family. So, when one day he comes home on an award leave, it makes Pom Sun very happy. But while he is on his way home, the General visits the building site. Ok Chol and Pom Sun feel regret. Pom Sun blames herself for caring only about her own family. She goes to the plant and learns at work what lies deep in the soldiers’ hearts as their utmost wish. It is to dedicate their everything to realize the General’s wish to make Koreans the happiest people in the world and to have the honor of taking a photo with the General. Pom Sun experiences the happiness of such wish coming true when the General has his photo taken with the members of Military Officers’ Family Art Group. She works hard for the day when her husband’s wish should also comes true. Ok Chol leaves on another task, she sends him off with a smile. The story ends as follows: the dear General calls Ok Chol and the soldiers in his presence to have a group photograph taken.
